mapper.select: select c.code, c.group_code, c.name, c.id as code_id, case when c.deleted > 0 then '삭제' end from codes c where c.group_code = #{groupCode}

select cg.group_code, cg.group_name, cg.description, cu.name as created_by, cg.created_at, uu.name as update_by, cg.updated_at from code_groups cg left join users cu on cu.id = cg.created_by left join users uu on uu.id = cg.updated_by where cg.editable = 1
